ethics.translation[0].definitions[0].def: moral rules or principles of behaviour for deciding what is right and wrong
ethics.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a report on the ethics of gene therapy
ethics.translation[1].definitions[0].def: moral rules or principles of behaviour that should guide members of a profession or organization and make them deal honestly and fairly with each other and with their customers
ethics.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Besides sales techniques, salespeople will get training in contract law, psychology, and business ethics.
The firm observes high standards of professional ethics.
a journalistic code of ethics (=list of moral rules for a particular activity or profession)
